page.title: 07CHILDREN'S FASHION 1985
page.content: The fashion for{boys}is loose fitting jeans with elasticated bottoms,a belt and a t-shirt.For{girls}it's an all in one suit in pastel colours or a baggy top and a tight skirt.{Girls}wear jumpers with batwing sleeves.For shoes {boys}wear trainers, and{girls}wear plastic shoes called jelly beans. There is a dance craze called {breakdancing}and there is a fashion to go with it.The{boys}wear baggy cotton trousers,a scarf belt,a t-shirt,a head band,and hi-tec boots.{Girls}wear batwinged t-shirts,shorts,hi-tec boots,a head band and studded bracelets. For leisure wear{girls}wear 3/4 length trousers and a t-shirt, or shorts and a t-shirt with jelly bean shoes,or a flower-print suit with jazz shoes.{Boys}wear shorts and t-shirts.
